test-method.name: getLocalizationValid
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/localization' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Print and verify the response status code and response body 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: getActiveLanguages
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/i18n/languages?limit=50&offset=0&sortOrder=ASC&activeOnly=true' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not include any request body (null) 3. Print the response status code and response body for logging 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: getDashboardShortcuts
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/shortcuts' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not provide any request body (null) 3. Print the response status code and body for verification 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: getAuthProviders
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/auth/openid-providers?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not include any request body (null) 3. Log the date used, response status code, and response body 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: getAdminOAuthList
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/oauth-clients?limit=50&offset=0' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not provide any request body (null) 3. Print the response status code and response body for validation 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: getEmployeeList
test-method.description: 1. Construct the endpoint '/web/index.php/api/v2/pim/employees?limit=50&offset=0&model=detailed&includeEmployees=onlyCurrent&sortField=employee.firstName&sortOrder=ASC' 2. Send a GET request with the constructed endpoint, valid cookie, and request body 3. Print the response status code and body for verification 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: putLanguagePackage
test-method.description: 1. fetch the language package number thast doesnt already exist in the list. 2. Send a PUT request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/i18n/languages/{{lang_package_no}}' endpoint with a valid cookie and request body\n3. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 4. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating successful creation

test-method.name: deleteLangById
test-method.description: 1. fetch the language package number that doesnt already exist in the list and send its id as req body. 2. Send a DELETE request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/i18n/languages' endpoint with a valid cookie and request body\n3. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 4. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating successful creation

test-method.name: putModulesSettings
test-method.description: 1. Create a req body with boolean entries ,. 2. Send a PUT request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/modules' endpoint with a valid cookie and request body\n3. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 4. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating successful creation

test-method.name: postOpenIdProvide
test-method.description: 1. Create a req body with required fields({name: "ABCDE", url: "WWW.GOOGLE.COM", clientId: "1", clientSecret: "123"}) and making the name unique. 2. Send a POST request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/auth/openid-providers' endpoint with a valid cookie and request body\n3. Print the request body, response status code, and response body for debugging 4. Assert that the response status code is 200, indicating successful creation
